article.headline: Stock-market bears have their backs to the wall
article.body: The second table has been corrected to show the best and worst years of performance. The current segment of this stock-market rally started from a modest oversold condition on Sept. 24, when the market reversed upward after finding support at almost exactly the 3200 level on the S&P 500 index. It has now traversed the entire trading range up to the resistance at 3425-3430. There have been six different trading days since Sept. 9 where the high of the day has been in that 3425-3430 area. If...
